title: For an Elegant Night of Villains - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Beautiful Female Lead   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage   Nobles   Royalty   Wealthy Characters
author: Baek Seoha   백서하
description:
When I woke up, my seven-years worth of memories was gone.

I was a Princess, then became the Grand Duchess,

And I was in a hostile relationship with my ‘husband’ who married me four years ago.

And last night, which I didn’t remember,

Was my first night with him.

“I waited for four years, and on the next day, you lost your memory. You are truly an amazing woman, aren’t you?”

I think I made a huge mistake.

So in frustration, I tried to search for my memories.

However, when the truth revealed itself to me bit by bit, the reality of the situation was very different from what I previously knew…

After losing my memory, will I fall in love with you?

Wouldn’t you want to let go of someone who knew nothing?>
